description: I am an older generation player. I started playing AlbionOnline 1 year ago. It's a very well developed game, released between 2017/2018. It has a rich economy system, that thanks to almost-full-loot system, requires constant crafting of items and creates natural demand for them, also self-balancing item content. When you die, you lose items except of silver and some items can trash. This also makes this game spicy and gives a thrill on PvP maps, but the higher the risk the higher possible gains (loot from others). Overall, game is pretty much more PvP oriented which is great. For the powers/skills they depend on items you wear and their power also depends on bonus acheived through using particular item (gaining experience). Special website exists accumulating different builds efficient for different purposes (ganking, guild wars, dungeons etc..). Crafting requires gathering resources and on higher tire maps requires venturing into PvP maps, where you need to defend yourself while looking for resources. If you count in graphics and diverse world, it's really the best MMORPG as of 2019.
downloads update, but won't launch
better with friends

no boooting

wont launch

I've discovered on the Steam Deck in Desktop Mode that the game sometimes doesn't start up. To solve this unpredictable issue I found out that in the startup screen before hitting "Play", where you get the first window(before it starts loading 0%...1%...until 100%)
you have to go into settings. You gotta choose in Graphics "Windowed mode" and then from "Ultra" to "Normal". Now try launching and it should more reliably launch.

If you are in Desktop Mode while playing you have to switch from fullscreen to windowed, otherwise you won't be able to use the chat in-game since it won't show the Steam keyboard in fullscreen. Also you may not be able to use the touchpads and instead only being able to use the touch screen to get around which can be kinda unflexible.
summary: Steam Deck review of Albion Online

description: CA NT LIVE A LIE RUNNING FOR MY LIFE

There is a scam in this game called the Duel scam. The game developers allow it. Basically an experirneced player comes along and says they will give you money through a battle. They are not wearing any gear and you think, sure, I will take your money. So they do a duel with you for a wager. Of course, you don't have a lot of money, so you can only wager as much as you have. They also may want to show you that they are being truthful, so they do a small wager and let you win. Now comes the scam. Now they do a big wager, and when you duel them, they quickly put their gear on and beat you and take all your money. AND THE DEVELOPERS OF ALBION ONLINE ALLOW THIS.. To stop this from happening, all they had to do was to do a little fix to stop people from being able to trick new players into a duel scam. But they allow experienced players to scam new people. And thus, New players sometimes uninstall the game because they got scammed and received no help from anyone, and in fact, there are so many players in this game who are like this. ... It's such a shame because this is really a beautiful game. It's just a tragedy that it is so full of idiots.
summary: The game is awesome, but the Developers and players are not

description: This seems to download around 400mb of data every launch, when run as a flatpak, as opposed to using the native linux installer available at https://albiononline.com/en/download
summary: Downloads significant data on each start

description: Y gratis!!!!!!

albion online es un mmorpg no lineal en el que escribes tu propia historia sin limitarte a seguir un camino prefijado, explora un amplio mundo abierto con cinco biomas unicos, todo cuanto hagas tendra su repercusíon en el mundo, con su economia orientada al jugador de albion los jugadores crean practicamente todo el equipo a partir de los recursos que consiguen, el equipo que llevas define quien eres, cambia de arma y armadura para pasar de caballero a mago o juego como una mezcla de ambas clases, aventurate en el mundo abierto y haz frente a los habitantes y las criaturas de albion, inicia expediciones o adentrate en mazmorras en las que encontraras enemigos aun mas dificiles, enfrentate a otros jugadores en encuentros en el mundo abierto, lucha por los territorios o por ciudades enteras en batallas tacticas, relajate en tu isla privada donde podras construir un hogar, cultivar cosechas, criar animales, unete a un gremio, todo es mejor cuando se trabaja en grupo [musica] adentrate ya en el mundo de albion y escribe tu propia historia.

Comentarios: 172

Compartir

summary: El mejor RPG al que he jugado en mi vida
